spec_data.Name: claws-mail-plugins-fetchinfo
spec_data.Description:
This plugin inserts headers containing some download information:
UIDL, Sylpheeds account name, POP server, user ID and retrieval time.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 17 Sep 2017 05:07:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Modify headers of downloaded messages in Claws Mail
